summary: A highly motivated professional striving to learn and develop in challenging environments. Exceptional experience of living and working abroad including over 5 years’ experience working in German-speaking nations bringing a fluent command of the language. Highly influential member of any team with a proven record of exceeding expectations and targets, which has earnt respect across each company I have worked with. A natural ability to establish rapport and trust has built strong customer relationships and loyal teams; and a pro-active leader who leads by example from the front through informed and decisive actions. Well-rounded approachable individual comfortable leading a team, working within a team, or speaking in front of clients, colleagues and peers. Extremely active in sports enhancing ability to cope under pressure and communicate efficiently and effectively.
